author:
Tim Booth                                                    
                            AP
title: MLB teams will have to embrace creative pitching strategies whenever season begins
description: Even with players likely to have some time to get ready, MLB teams will have to be creative with how they handle starting pitchers when baseball returns.
content:
SEATTLE Even with major leaguers likely to receive some semblance of another spring training to get ready, teams are going to have to be creative with how they handle starting pitchers whenever baseball returns.
The last thing anyone wants is arm problems to… [+3197 chars]
